column2: "Na Sara dzii mfe ɔha eduonu esuon."
"Na Sara wui wɔ Kiriat-arba ɔnoara nye Hebron
column3: wɔ Keenan asaase do; na Abraham bae begyaam Sara

column2: "Na Abraham soɛree fii no fun no enyim
column6: "Meyɛ ɔhɔho nye ɔmamforanyi wɔ hom nkyɛn: hom mma me efunsiebea bi wɔ hom nkyɛn
column7: ma minsie mo fun mfi m’enyi do."

column2: "Na Hetmba no buaa Abraham see no dɛ
column5: tsie hɛn: eyɛ okunyin katakyi wɔ hɛn mu: hɛn asamandan mu dza woara epɛ no
column6: sie wo fun wɔ mu; hɛn mu biara nnkam wo n’asamandan

column3: na ɔbɔɔ no mu adze maa asaase no do nkorɔfo no
Sɛ hom adwen nye dɛ misie mo fun fi m’enyi do a
column5: na wɔnserɛ Zohar ne ba Efron mma me
column7: "ma ɔmfa Makepela ɔbo tu a ɔwɔ no a ɔwɔ ne haban ano no mma me; ɔngye bo a ɔfata na ɔmfa mma me ma minnya efunsiebea wɔ hom finimfin."

column2: "Afei Efron tse Hetmba no hɔn finimfin: na Hetnyi Efron buaa Abraham wɔ Hetmba no asomu
column3: mekyerɛ hɔn a wɔhɛn no kurow n’abotsen mu no nyinara asomu dɛ
column7: tsie me: haban no medze ma wo
column8: na ɔbo tu a ɔwɔ mu no medze ma wo; wɔ me man mba hɔn enyim medze ma wo: sie wo fun."

column2: "Na Abraham bɔɔ no mu adze wɔ asaase no do nkorɔfo no hɔn enyim."
"Na ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ Efron wɔ asaase no do nkorɔfo no hɔn asomu dɛ
column6: tsie me: mebɛma haban no ne tsibo; gye no wɔ mo hɔ
column7: ma minsie mo fun wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Na Efron buaa Abraham see no dɛ
column5: tsie me: dwetɛ dwetɛbona ahaanan asaase nye dɛn wɔ emi na ɔwo ntamu? Dɛm ntsi sie wo fun."

column2: "Na Abraham tsiee Efron; na Abraham keer dwɛɛtɛɛ a Efron bɔɔ dzin wɔ Hetmba no asomu no maa no
column3: dwetɛ dwetɛbona ahaanan a ɔyɛ eguadzifo sika a wodzi no."

column2: "Nna Efron ne haban a ɔwɔ Makepela a ɔwɔ Mamre enyim no
column4: nye ɔbo tu a ɔwɔ mu no
column5: nye ndua a ɔwɔ haban no mu no nyinara a ɔwɔ ne hanoa nyinara bɔ aprɔw no

column2: "maa Abraham dɛ enyadze wɔ Hetmba no hɔn enyim
column3: wɔ hɔn a wɔhɛn no kurow n’abotsen mu nyinara enyim."
Abraham siee ne yer Sara wɔ Makepela haban no mu ɔbo tu mu wɔ Mamre enyim (ɔnoara nye Hebron)
nye ɔbotu a ɔwɔ mu no
column4: Hetmba no sii no pi dɛ enyadze maa Abraham dɛ efunsiebea."
